#NXP LPC13xxSampleSoftware

= Introduction =

NXP LPC13xxSampleSoftware ported to GCC.
The orignal code can be downloaded from NXP support page here:

[http://ics.nxp.com/support/documents/microcontrollers/zip/code.bundle.lpc13xx.keil.zip Sample Code Bundle for LPC13xx Peripherals using Keil's MDK-ARM, V1.01 (Oct 21, 2009) ]

= Status =
2010.01.19  ver 1.00    Prelimnary version, first Release [http://code.google.com/p/32bitmicro/source/browse/trunk/src/nxp/lpc13xx/LPC13xx_SampleSoftware/ SVN trunk]
= Included Samples =
  * [http://code.google.com/p/32bitmicro/source/browse/trunk/src/nxp/lpc13xx/LPC13xx_SampleSoftware/readme.txt  readme.txt]
